com.rshepard.blackjack.interfaces

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dealer, HumanPlayer

    public interface Player
    Player interface used to set the general actions of the players

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(Card c)
      Adds a card to the current player's hand
      java.util.Stack<Card> getHand()
      Gets the current hand of the player
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the current player

    • Method Detail

      • addCard

        void addCard(Card c)
        Adds a card to the current player's hand
        Parameters:
        c - Card object to add to the hand(stack)

      • getHand

        java.util.Stack<Card> getHand()
        Gets the current hand of the player
        Returns:
        A Stack consisting of card objects of the current player

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the current player
        Returns:
        String of the player's name
